title: "Ask An AI Chatbot" right click context menu
content:
Mozilla changed the longstanding "Copy Link Address" hotkey from "A" to "L" in Firefox 88.

They have decided to not consider reverting this change, even though "L" is far less accessible than "A" and brings it out of sync with accessibility keys across other browsers.

Reference: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1701324

Firefox broke copy link address right click context menu hotkey "A" again in Firefox 142 by adding "Ask an AI Chatbot" and this time I'm not sure I can get around it with an extension https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/link-copy/

Can this context menu option be made optional or something please?

title: Problematica nell'utilizzo di JD Edwards
content:
Salve,

segnalo che da quando è stata installata sui client la versione 140.0 di Firefox stiamo riscontrando alcune anomalie nell'accesso al nostro gestionale JD Edwards che è un gestionale web.

Il primo problema riscontrato accade cliccando su un pulsante che si chiama "Preferiti". A volte funziona e mostra il contenuto del menu, a volte invece pur essendo premuto non appare nulla (vedere file 1.jpg).

L'altra problematica riguarda la visualizzazione della griglia. Se ad esempio imposto zoom al 140% (nel mio caso, ma può essere anche il 120%) uso la barra di scorrimento inferiore per muovere la griglia orizzontalmente e questa prosegue da sola lo scorrimento senza più fermarsi. Se cambio lo zoom al 100% si interrompe questo spostamento della barra. Sarebbe da vedere direttamente.

Attendo vostre info in merito. Grazie, cordiali saluti

Yuri Ceroni
creator: yceroni.clai

title: Chatbot sidebar addone resume
content:
Salve,

capita più che durante la mia esperienza di navigazione mi ritrovo a fare avanti indietro, da e verso determinati siti e tab di gemini o chatgpt... con diverse tab aperte è noioso pertanto per avere più ordine e speravo più convenienza ho iniziato a usare l'addon chatbot sulla barra laterale. Ma ho scoperto che rispetto ad una normale scheda ha diverse limitazioni intrinseche. Se voglio temporaneamente chiudere il pannello per avere più spazio sul sito e poi lo riapro, noto che non rimane aperta sull'ultima chat col chatbot, ma ritorna alla schermata di benvenuto, ed ogni volta sono costretto ad andarmi a ripescare la chat dalla mia lista di chat. Questo è frustrante e noioso e mi obbliga a ritornare spesso al paradigma del bot aperto in una normale tab pinnata. Vi chiedo se c'è esiste qualche work around e se è prevista l'aggiunta della persistenza in futuro... renderebbe Firefox migliore ancor di piú di quanto non lo è gia.

Rey

title: Not all tab groups will fully collapse, as before
content:
Since yesterday, some of my tab groups don't fully collapse when the group tab is clicked. Instead, one tab in the group remains fully expanded, followed by a number indicating how many other tabs are in the group. A screen shot is attached.

Since I enabled tab groups some weeks ago, tab groups have behaved as expected. When the group header is clicked, the tabs in the group spread out to be visible and clickable. When the header is clicked again, all tabs in the group collapse entirely behind the header tab.

Most of my tab groups are still behaving this way. But new groups are now displaying one full tab plus the number, no matter how many other tabs or tab groups are already occupying the window.

Since the behavior is inconsistent, it doesn't seem to be a setting. Is there any fix?

title: Firefox hangs
content: Ever since this month's Windows 10 update I've been having problems with Firefox. I start it, the menu bar and tab comes up, but then nothing. I can't access any web sites. I tried removing the Windows update, then tried uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox, and then messing with the settings. In each case Firefox would work for a couple of days, then I'd have to start it three or four times to get it to work, then it wouldn't work at all. I've been using it for 10 or more years now (four on this computer) and have never had any problems before. I'm loathe to switch to another browser, but if this can't be fixed I won't have any choice. This is what happens when I start the program.
creator: michael_lemick

creator: me9907177

title: Similar problems in both Firefox and Thunderbird
content:
Several months ago, both my Firefox and my Thunderbird stopped working. Thanks to help from this website, both were repaired. New problems have occurred and I’m here again, hoping for help. My computer is a Dell XPS desktop, running Windows 11 (Home), upgraded from Windows 10. Both FF and TB are up to date.

So, problems: TB: I turn on the computer in the morning, have a small breakfast, then start TB. The Inbox appears on the screen and then the request for my password. When I type the first letter, it doesn’t appear. I type it again, it appears, and then I finish entering the password. Works fine after that. Well, almost. I want to delete several non-consecutive emails. What used to work was to hold down Ctrl key, then click on emails to be deleted, finally release Ctrl. Now what happens is the first email to be deleted is highlighted but when I click on the second email, the first email is unselected. Then I release Ctrl, press it once again, select first email, then additional emails to be deleted. They are all highlighted. FF: Inconsistent download times. I just tried to download a webpage from one of my bookmark folders. After about 30 seconds, with nothing showing, I closed the page, then tried downloading again. Another 30 seconds, same result. I closed FF then reopened it, tried loading the same page. It appeared in just a few seconds. Opened the Google webpage, clicked Maps and received the error shown. (First image) Clicked Try Again, Maps reappeared.

Sometime after these problems began, I noticed something different on my Task Bar. When FF was not running and I hovered the pointer over the FF icon, the name of the icon was displayed but was followed by the number 2 within parentheses. (See the image). The same thing for TB. Are these numbers somehow connected to the problems I am having with TB and FF?

Any help will be appreciated. Thanks.
creator: I_Rufus
